Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ModelView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ModelView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ModelView extends Object implements Serializable
ModelView class represents the client's data for the View implementation.
See Also:
